author: Rebecca Shabad
title: Out of the hospital, Rep. Ben McAdams says COVID-19 'hit me really, really hard'
description: Rep. Ben McAdams, D-Utah, said Thursday that he's feeling much better now that he's out of the hospital where he stayed for a week with COVID-19.
content:
Out of the hospital, Rep. Ben McAdams says COVID-19 'hit me really, really hard'
Rep. Ben McAdams, D-Utah, said Thursday that he's feeling much better now that he's out of the hospital where he stayed for more than a week with COVID-19. 
"I found myself in … [+6861 chars]
